task: Create a digital self-care and mindfulness retreat series that integrates AI-driven personalized wellness routines, virtual meditation spaces, sustainable lifestyle workshops, and AI-powered adaptive relaxation techniques. The program must include developing interactive storylines, managing regional cuisine-based cooking classes, facilitating expert talks on sustainable habits, structuring a virtual community platform for participants, and generating personalized wellness reports. Additionally, ensure global distribution of eco-friendly wellness packages, monitor participant progress through adaptive AI, and incorporate multilingual support for global accessibility.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that interacts with the user and delegates tasks to other agents.

agents.name: program_development_agent
agents.role: Leads the development of the retreat series, focusing on interactive content and immersive experiences.

agents.name: interactive_media_designer_agent
agents.role: Designs interactive media content that enhances participant engagement.

agents.name: storyline_creation_agent
agents.role: Crafts narratives that guide participants through the retreat experience.

agents.name: user_experience_research_agent
agents.role: Conducts research to ensure the retreat aligns with participant needs and expectations.

agents.name: virtual_space_designer_agent
agents.role: Creates digital environments for meditation and relaxation sessions.

agents.name: meditation_environment_creator_agent
agents.role: Specializes in designing tranquil spaces that facilitate meditation practices.

agents.name: culinary_event_management_agent
agents.role: Organizes and manages regional cuisine-based cooking classes.

agents.name: regional_cuisine_tutor_agent
agents.role: Provides expertise on regional cuisines and leads interactive cooking sessions.

agents.name: interactive_cooking_experience_agent
agents.role: Facilitates real-time cooking classes for a hands-on culinary experience.

agents.name: sustainability_education_agent
agents.role: Coordinates educational content on sustainable living practices.

agents.name: expert_talks_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Organizes expert talks and seminars on sustainability.

agents.name: global_sustainability_expert_agent
agents.role: Collaborates with global experts to provide insights on sustainability.

agents.name: webinar_organization_agent
agents.role: Handles logistics for online webinars and seminars.

agents.name: virtual_community_platform_agent
agents.role: Develops and maintains an online platform to facilitate community interaction.

agents.name: participant_engagement_agent
agents.role: Promotes interaction and community building among participants.

agents.name: wellness_package_distribution_agent
agents.role: Responsible for the global distribution of eco-friendly wellness packages.

agents.name: sustainable_packaging_design_agent
agents.role: Designs environmentally friendly packaging solutions.

agents.name: global_shipping_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Coordinates international shipping logistics.

agents.name: ai_adaptive_relaxation_agent
agents.role: Implements AI-driven adaptive relaxation techniques and personalizes routines.

agents.name: progress_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Tracks participant progress and adjusts programs based on real-time data.

agents.name: real-time_feedback_system_agent
agents.role: Collects real-time feedback for continuous improvement of the program.

tools.name: interactive_cooking_experience_agent
tools.description: Facilitates live, interactive cooking sessions with participants around the world.

recipe_details.description: Details of the recipes to be used during the session

participant_count.description: Number of participants in the session

tools.name: real-time_feedback_system_agent
tools.description: Collects and processes real-time feedback from participants to enhance retreat sessions.
